checkRunningBDS.tip: This may cause the network port and the level to be occupied
checkRunningBDS.ask: Do you want to terminate the process with PID {}?  (y=Yes, n=No, e=Exit)

fixAllowList.checkManually: Both allowlist.json and whitelist.json exist and aren't empty. Please check them manually

warning.productionEnv: PLEASE DO NOT USE IN PRODUCTION ENVIRONMENT!

protocolVersionNotMatch.1: Protocol version not match, target version: {}, current version: {}.
protocolVersionNotMatch.2: This will most likely crash the server, please use the LiteLoader that matches the BDS version!

bstats.enabled: bStats has been enabled, you can edit plugins/bStats/config.json to disable it

unpackResources.begin: Unpacking LiteLoaderBDS runtime resources. Please wait patiently...

listPlugin.tip: * Send command "ll list <Plugin Name>" for more information

help.msg:
[Introduction]
LiteLoaderBDS is an unofficial plugin loader for modding development of Bedrock Dedicated Server.
It provides a huge nubmer of APIs, a powerful event system and lots of packed utility interfaces .
[Github]
--> https://github.com/LiteLDev/LiteLoaderBDS <--
Welcome to our github project to get more information ~

error.noPathSpecified: You must provide a valid path of LiteLoader plugin!
error.noNameSpecified: You must provide a valid name of LiteLoader plugin!

config.creating: LL Config File <{}> not found. Creating configuration file...

crashLogger.existsingDebuggerDetected: Existing debugger detected. Builtin CrashLogger will not work.
crashLogger.wineDetected: Wine Environment detected. Builtin CrashLogger will not work.

crashLoggerDisabled.1: Builtin CrashLogger is not enabled because the configuration disabled it.
crashLoggerDisabled.2: There will be no crash log when unhandled exception occurs,
crashLoggerDisabled.3: which makes it almost impossible to find out the reason for crash and the source of crash.
crashLoggerDisabled.4: We strongly recommend you to enable it to ensure server stability

conflicts.1: Builtin CrashLogger is not enabled because plugin <{}> conflicts with it
conflicts.2: There will be no crash log when unhandled exception occurs,
conflicts.3: which makes it almost impossible to find out the reason for crash and the source of crash.
conflicts.4: Since CrashLogger is an important component which ensures server stability
conflicts.5: We recommend you to think twice about the usage of plugin <{}>

fail.tip: There will be no crash log when unhandled exception occurs.

error.parsingEnabledAddonsList: Error when parsing enabled addons list

removeAddonFromList.fail: Fail to remove addon <{}> from config file!
